description: This is a React component written in TypeScript/TSX that displays a table of network devices with functionalities such as search, filter, sort, pagination, and actions like add, edit, delete, view, and ping. It interacts with API functions to fetch device data and perform actions.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetches device data from the server using current filter, sort, page, and pageSize settings.

methods.name: onSortClick
methods.description: Handles sorting logic when a column header is clicked, toggling ascending and descending order.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Sets the state to show delete confirmation dialog for the selected device.

methods.name: confirmDeleteAction
methods.description: Confirms and executes device deletion, then refreshes the data and shows toast messages.

methods.name: onPing
methods.description: Pings a device if monitoring is enabled, shows a toast message with the result, and refreshes data.
